videos.title: Portugal Marathon - Multi-Brand Collaboration Reel
videos.description: Led multi-brand content campaign coordinating four partners (Rookie Run Club, Effekt, Mirari.pt, DJ Betoo) into a cohesive social-first reel. Managed creative direction, platform-optimized vertical formatting, and beat-synced editing to maximize engagement. Part of a content strategy that grew Rookie Run Club PT from 0 to 15K Instagram followers.
videos.client: Rookie Run Club PT, Effekt, Mirari.pt, DJ Betoo

videos.title: Malice Pizza x Rookie Run Club - Portugal Promo
videos.description: Brand partnership content created from concept through delivery for cross-brand social campaign. Ideated the creative approach, shot on location in Portugal, edited for social-first engagement, and delivered platform-optimized cuts. Demonstrates end-to-end content creation for brand collaborations.
videos.client: Malice Pizza & Rookie Run Club PT

videos.title: Rookie Run Club x Oficina Loba - Portugal Collaboration
videos.description: Conceived and produced brand collaboration reel from scratch — handled creative direction, cinematography, editing, motion graphics, and social delivery. Part of a recurring content strategy that built Rookie Run Club PT's Instagram presence from zero to 15K followers.
videos.client: Rookie Run Club PT & Oficina Loba

videos.title: Rookie Run Club - Recovery Advertisement
videos.description: Performance-optimized social ad created for Instagram Reels — beat-synced cuts, motivational messaging, and platform-native formatting designed to drive engagement and brand awareness within a fitness audience.

videos.title: Intuitive Training Concept Reel / TikTok Trend
videos.description: Identified a trending TikTok format, adapted it for a niche fitness audience, and produced a YouTube Short that demonstrated platform trend awareness and rapid content execution. Shows ability to spot cultural moments and ship content quickly.

videos.title: Hyperscale Data Centers Taking Over Minnesota
videos.description: Investigative YouTube documentary produced for Breakthrough News (20K → 1M subscribers). Led post-production for a 25-person remote editorial team — built story structure, managed audio post-production, and maintained brand consistency across all output.

videos.title: A. Parker's Garage Doors | Meet the Owner
videos.description: Customer story content designed to build trust with professional audiences. Extracted an authentic narrative from a raw owner interview, paced for conversion, and integrated corporate branding. Became the client's most effective marketing asset — demonstrating content that drives real business outcomes.

testimonial.name: Adam Parker
testimonial.quote: The video perfectly represents our family business values and has significantly improved our customer engagement. Professional quality that exceeded our expectations.

videos.title: The Pay Off | A Powerlifting Short Film
videos.description: Brand storytelling content for Zao Strength — part of a social-first content strategy that scaled the brand from $0 to $100K in revenue exclusively through social media. This 8-minute short film demonstrates narrative depth, emotional pacing, and the kind of premium content that builds loyal audiences.

testimonial.name: Jake Remmert
testimonial.quote: The creative vision and technical execution brought our story to life in ways we never imagined. This film perfectly captures the essence of powerlifting dedication.

videos.title: FBI Whistleblower: Israel Has Corrupted The US Government
videos.description: Long-form YouTube documentary for MintPress News (40K → 101K subscribers). 45-minute interview edit demonstrating ability to create the kind of deep, trust-building content that grows professional audiences through substance over flash.

testimonial.name: Mnar Adley
testimonial.quote: The technical quality and professional presentation elevated our interview content to broadcast standard. Exceptional work in both production and post-production phases.

videos.title: 2025 Editorial & Color Grading Reel
videos.description: Production reel showcasing hands-on content creation across documentary, commercial, social, and branded content. Demonstrates range across platforms and formats — from 30-second social ads to 45-minute documentaries.

videos.title: How AI will Impact the Fitness Industry - Motion Graphics Highlight
videos.description: Trend-driven social content exploring AI's impact on fitness — kinetic typography, motion graphics, and platform-native formatting for Instagram engagement.
